legacies.name: Emberfang’s Blessing
legacies.description: A fiery legacy that enhances courage and destructive power, but risks burning out the Tamer’s spirit.

legacies.name: Mosshide’s Blessing
legacies.description: An earthen legacy that grants resilience and stability, anchoring the Tamer to the Grove’s roots.

legacies.name: Cloudtail’s Blessing
legacies.description: A windy legacy that bestows agility and freedom, but may leave the Tamer unmoored.
